name: Chibilry
description:
A high-speed ninja fighting game, with paper styled fighter. Choose either Ninja Red or Ninja Blue, each with their own skill set! Deck it out in style in CHIBILRY.

Feature List

• 1 vs. 1 match
• Choose from 4 playable characters
• Choose from 4 stages
• Fast paced fighting
• Fun and quirky Chibi style

Created by

Donald Malone

Oksana Zavisky

Ryan Grasso
